content: this pattern uses up small bits of left over yarn you can choose to use any weight of yarn here are some suggestions and relative sizes as shown in the first picture a 6cm/2½ inches tall jamiesons spindrift in 114 mooskit on 2 25mm needles b 7 5cm/3 inches tall lettlopi in 054 light ash heather on 2 75mm needles c 8cm/3 ½ inches tall cascade 200 in 8011 aspen heather on 3mm needles d 9 5cm/4 inches tall camarose snefnug in 7360 stengra in 3 5mm needles for pattern please see https //littlecottonrabbits typepad co uk/free_knitting_patterns/tiny_knitted_toys/ as of june 2023 there is a new pdf file for this pattern if you d like to make the bear then you can use the ears from the free christmas tree bears pattern here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bear-christmas-tree-decorations
